ground_truth: A plane takes off from Orlando International Airport amid heavy clouds. In a room, a digital clock on a bedside table reads 7:13 and then turns to 7:14. A naked dark-haired woman, with her hair falling around her shoulders, sits up on a bed and then gets off the bed. A naked man sleeping on his stomach wakes up as the woman takes a purse and walks out of the room; the man picks up a cell phone, sits up in bed, drinks from an almost empty beer bottle, and watches the shapely woman reenter the room. The woman picks out some clothes, slips on a thong, and the man lights a cigarette while the woman lights a joint. The man lies on his back, the woman climbs on the bed and straddles the man, puts the joint to his lips, then gets off the bed. The man smokes a cigarette, sits up, and snorts a line of cocaine. He walks out of the room dressed in a black suit, sporting dark glasses under a pilot's cap, with an airplane pin on his lapel. As rain lashes the airport and lightning flashes in the distance, people run across the tarmac. The man, now in a raincoat, walks under a parked South Jet airplane, pauses near one of the wheels, opens his mouth, sprays some mouth freshener, trots to the mobile stairway leading to the passenger walkway, and slips on the first step. He joins the passengers through a side door and sits next to his co-pilot, Whitaker. Whip inhales oxygen and fidgets on his side of the cockpit as Ken watches him brush his hair. Meanwhile, a woman steps out of her room at Hotel Atlanta, carrying a folded-up massage table, wearing a dress, and showing a small tattoo on her shoulder. She pulls some bills from a bundle of cash, walks to a car, and places the massage table in the trunk. She smokes as she makes a call from the driver's seat, leans on the steering wheel, and lowers the phone to the passenger seat. A man snorts coke and looks Nicole over, while Brad drops his towel and holds a small square. Elsewhere, Margaret sits facing Trina. Back in the plane, Whip pushes the side-stick forward, the cockpit shakes, and Whip takes the yoke and pulls back as they ascend. The plane shakes, and items fall from the overhead bins. Ken casts an uneasy sideways glance at Whip, who, with eyes on the horizon, steers the plane through the rough air. He moves the side-stick forward, the altimeter slides quickly to the right as the plane rises, and they reach a clearing through clouds and bright sunlight as Whip levels out.

test_cases.name: Synonym Substitution
test_cases.description:
Sure, here's the transformed text with synonyms while preserving the sentence structure and meaning:

A aircraft lifts off from Orlando International Airport amid dense clouds. In a chamber, a digital clock on a bedside table shows 7:13 and then shifts to 7:14. A bare dark-tressed woman, with her hair cascading around her shoulders, sits up on a bed and then gets off the bed. A bare man dozing on his belly awakens as the woman takes a handbag and walks out of the chamber; the man grabs a mobile phone, sits up in bed, drinks from an almost vacant beer bottle, and observes the shapely woman reenter the chamber. The woman selects some garments, slips on a thong, and the man ignites a cigarette while the woman ignites a joint. The man reclines on his back, the woman climbs on the bed and straddles the man, puts the joint to his lips, then gets off the bed. The man smokes a cigarette, sits up, and snorts a line of cocaine. He walks out of the chamber attired in a black suit, sporting dark spectacles under a pilot's cap, with an airplane pin on his lapel. As rain lashes the airport and lightning flashes in the distance, people sprint across the tarmac. The man, now in a raincoat, walks under a parked South Jet aircraft, pauses near one of the wheels, opens his mouth, sprays some mouth freshener, trots to the mobile stairway leading to the passenger walkway, and slips on the first step. He joins the passengers through a side door and sits next to his co-pilot, Whitaker. Whip inhales oxygen and fidgets on his side of the cockpit as Ken watches him brush his hair. Meanwhile, a woman steps out of her chamber at Hotel Atlanta, carrying a folded-up massage table, wearing a dress, and showing a small tattoo on her shoulder. She pulls some bills from a bundle of cash, walks to a car, and places the massage table in the trunk. She smokes as she makes a call from the driver's seat, leans on the steering wheel, and lowers the phone to the passenger seat. A man snorts coke and looks Nicole over, while Brad drops his towel and holds a small square. Elsewhere, Margaret sits facing Trina. Back in the aircraft, Whip pushes the side-stick forward, the cockpit shakes, and Whip takes the yoke and pulls back as they ascend. The aircraft shakes, and items fall from the overhead bins. Ken casts an uneasy sideways glance at Whip, who, with eyes on the horizon, steers the aircraft through the turbulent air. He moves the side-stick forward, the altimeter slides swiftly to the right as the aircraft rises, and they reach a clearing through clouds and brilliant sunlight as Whip levels out.

test_cases.name: Active <-> Passive Transformation
test_cases.description: Amid heavy clouds, a plane is taken off from Orlando International Airport. In a room, 7:13 is read by a digital clock on a bedside table, which then turns to 7:14. A bed is sat up on by a naked dark-haired woman, with her hair falling around her shoulders, and then the bed is gotten off by her. A naked man sleeping on his stomach is awakened as his purse is taken by the woman, and the room is walked out of by her; a cell phone is picked up by the man, the bed is sat up in by him, an almost empty beer bottle is drunk from by him, and the shapely woman is watched by him as she reenters the room. Some clothes are picked out by the woman, a thong is slipped on by her, and a cigarette is lit by the man while a joint is lit by the woman. On his back lies the man, the bed is climbed onto and straddled by the woman, and the joint is put to his lips by her, then the bed is gotten off by her. A cigarette is smoked by the man, he sits up, and the room is walked out of by him dressed in a black suit, sporting dark glasses under a pilot's cap, with an airplane pin on his lapel. As the airport is lashed by rain and lightning flashes in the distance, across the tarmac run people. Now in a raincoat, under a parked South Jet airplane walks the man, near one of the wheels he pauses, his mouth is opened, and some mouth freshener is sprayed by him, to the mobile stairway leading to the passenger walkway he trots, and on the first step he slips. Through a side door he joins the passengers and his co-pilot, Whitaker, is sat next to by him. Oxygen is inhaled by Whip and on his side of the cockpit, he fidgets as Ken watches him brush his hair. Meanwhile, out of her room at Hotel Atlanta, steps a woman, carrying a folded-up massage table, wearing a dress, and showing a small tattoo on her shoulder. A bundle of cash is pulled from by her, to a car she walks, and the massage table is placed in the trunk. As a call is made by her from the driver's seat, she smokes, and on the steering wheel she leans, with the phone lowered to the passenger seat. Coke is snorted by a man and over Nicole he looks, while a small square is held by Brad as he drops his towel. Elsewhere, Trina is faced by Margaret as she sits. Back in the plane, the side-stick is pushed forward by Whip, the cockpit is shaken, and the yoke is taken by Whip and pulled back as they ascend. The plane is shaken, and from the overhead bins fall items. An uneasy sideways glance is cast at Whip by Ken, who, with eyes on the horizon, is steered by him through the rough air. The side-stick is moved forward by him, the altimeter quickly slides to the right as the plane rises, and a clearing through clouds and bright sunlight is reached as Whip levels out.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L1
test_cases.description: A plane takes off from Orlando International Airport under heavy clouds. In a room, a clock reads 7:13 before changing to 7:14. A naked dark-haired woman sits up in bed, then leaves the room with a purse, waking a man who drinks from a beer bottle and watches her return. She dresses and smokes a joint while he lights a cigarette, snorts cocaine, and dons a black suit, dark glasses, and a pilot's cap. As rain and lightning engulf the airport, he sprays mouth freshener, trots to the airplane stairway, joins passengers, and sits beside co-pilot Whitaker. Whip smokes, inhales oxygen, and fidgets in the cockpit. A woman exits Hotel Atlanta with a massage table, places it in her car, smokes, and calls someone. Elsewhere, a man snorts coke and observes Nicole, while Brad drops his towel. Back on the plane, Whip navigates rough air, causing items to fall, before leveling out in sunlight.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L2
test_cases.description: A plane departs from Orlando International in heavy clouds. A digital clock shifts from 7:13 to 7:14 in a room. A naked dark-haired woman rises from a bed, takes a purse, then exits. A man wakes, drinks from a beer, and watches her return. She dresses, while he lights a cigarette. She climbs on him with a joint, then leaves. He snorts cocaine, dons a black suit with sunglasses and pilot's cap, and steps into rain at the airport. Spray cools his breath as he joins passengers, slipping on stairs, to meet co-pilot Whitaker. Whip, in the cockpit, fidgets, upsetting Ken. Meanwhile, a woman leaves Hotel Atlanta with a massage table, a tattoo visible, grabs cash, then smokes while calling from her car. A man observes her. Margaret and Trina sit together elsewhere. In the plane, Whip manages controls through turbulence, and the plane rises into sunlight.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description: An airplane majestically takes off from the bustling Orlando International Airport, ascending into the sky amid a thick layer of heavy cloud cover. Meanwhile, within a dimly lit room, the digital clock perched on a bedside table displays the time as 7:13, soon shifting to 7:14. A woman with dark hair cascading over her shoulders, entirely unclothed, sits up slowly on the bed before gracefully rising from it. Nearby, a man, equally unclothed and lying face down, awakens when the woman collects her purse and exits the room. He reaches for his cell phone, sits up on the bed, takes a swig from a nearly empty beer bottle, and observes as the alluring woman reenters the space. She selects some clothes, deftly slipping into a thong, while the man casually ignites a cigarette as she lights up a joint. The man reclines backward as the woman climbs onto the bed, straddles him, and offers him the joint to his lips. She then gets off the bed. The man, cigarette in hand, sits up and indulges in a line of cocaine. He then exits the room, now dressed smartly in a black suit, complete with dark sunglasses and a pilot's cap, an airplane pin adorning his lapel. Outside, the airport is besieged by lashing rain and distant flashes of lightning, prompting people to dash hurriedly across the drenched tarmac. The man, now clad in a protective raincoat, walks briskly beneath a stationary South Jet airplane, pauses beside one of its enormous wheels, opens his mouth to spray some mouth freshener, and then moves at a quick pace toward the mobile stairway leading to the passenger walkway, where he slips slightly on the very first step. Entering through a side door, he sits down next to his co-pilot, Whitaker. Whip, inhaling deeply from an oxygen mask, shifts restlessly in his cockpit seat, while Ken, ever attentive, watches him carefully as he brushes his hair. At the same moment, a woman emerges from her room at Hotel Atlanta, carrying a folded-up massage table. She is clothed in a dress that reveals a small tattoo on her shoulder. She withdraws some bills from a bundle of cash, proceeds to her vehicle, and places the massage table securely in the trunk. As she smokes, she makes a phone call from the driver's seat, leaning on the steering wheel, and then lowers the phone onto the passenger seat. Elsewhere, a man indulges in snorting coke and gazes at Nicole, while Brad drops a towel and holds a small square item. In another setting, Margaret finds herself seated, facing Trina. Back on the aircraft, Whip pushes the side-stick forward. The cockpit vibrates intensely as Whip takes firm hold of the yoke and skillfully pulls back while they continue their ascent. The plane shudders, causing various items to tumble from the overhead bins. Ken, with a noticeable hint of unease, casts a sideways glance at Whip, who, with his eyes fixed steadily on the horizon, guides the plane through the turbulent air. He carefully moves the side-stick forward, and the altimeter rapidly slides to the right as the plane ascends ever higher. They finally break through the dense cloud cover into a clearing, where bright sunlight floods the cockpit, and Whip expertly levels out the aircraft.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L2
test_cases.description: A majestic airplane, embodying the epitome of grace and power, begins its ascent from the bustling Orlando International Airport, soaring upward into the vast expanse of the sky, barely visible through the dense layer of heavy cloud cover that blankets the scene. Meanwhile, in a dimly lit room shrouded in shadows, a digital clock, perched with a sense of quiet authority on a bedside table, displays the time as precisely 7:13. The numbers soon make their inevitable shift, transitioning to 7:14. The room's tranquility is interrupted as a woman, her dark hair cascading elegantly over her shoulders, sits up slowly on the bed, her form entirely unclothed. With a graceful motion, she rises from the bed. Nearby, a man, equally unclothed and sprawled face down, is roused from his slumber when he senses the woman gathering her purse and making her way out of the room. The man reaches for his cell phone with a groggy hand, sits up on the bed, takes a swig from a nearly empty beer bottle, and observes intently as the alluring woman reenters the space. She selects a few clothes, deftly slipping into a thong, while he casually ignites a cigarette in the dim ambiance as she lights up a joint. The man reclines backward into a more relaxed position as the woman elegantly climbs onto the bed, straddling him, and offers the joint gently to his lips. Afterward, she rises gracefully from the bed and moves away. The man, still holding his cigarette, sits up and indulges in a line of cocaine. He then exits the dimly lit room, now dressed smartly in a sharply tailored black suit, complete with dark sunglasses and a pilot's cap perched jauntily on his head, an airplane pin adorns his lapel, glimmering under the light. Outside, the airport is under siege by a relentless downpour of lashing rain, punctuated by distant flashes of lightning, prompting people to dash hurriedly across the drenched tarmac with a sense of urgency. The man, now clad in a protective raincoat, walks briskly beneath the stationary South Jet airplane, momentarily pausing beside one of its enormous wheels. He opens his mouth to spray some mouth freshener with a quick motion, then proceeds at a brisk pace toward the mobile stairway leading to the passenger walkway, where he slips slightly on the very first step. Entering through a side door, he settles into his seat next to his co-pilot, Whitaker. Whip, inhaling deeply from an oxygen mask, shifts restlessly in his cockpit seat, while Ken, ever attentive and watchful, observes him closely as he brushes his hair. Concurrently, a woman emerges from her room at Hotel Atlanta, carrying a neatly folded-up massage table. She is clothed in a dress that reveals a small but intriguing tattoo on her shoulder. With deliberate intent, she withdraws some bills from a substantial bundle of cash, proceeds to her vehicle, and places the massage table securely in the trunk. As she smokes, she makes a phone call from the driver's seat, leaning on the steering wheel with a sense of contemplation, and then places the phone carefully onto the passenger seat. Elsewhere, a man indulges in the act of snorting coke, his eyes fixed on Nicole, while Brad drops a towel and holds a small square item with a sense of purpose. In another setting, Margaret finds herself seated, facing Trina with an air of anticipation. Back on the aircraft, Whip, with a focused determination, pushes the side-stick forward. The cockpit vibrates with intense energy as Whip takes firm hold of the yoke and skillfully pulls back, guiding the plane ever higher as they continue their ascent. The plane shudders violently, causing various items to tumble haphazardly from the overhead bins. Ken, with a noticeable hint of unease in his demeanor, casts a sideways glance at Whip, who, with his eyes fixed steadily on the distant horizon, guides the plane through the turbulent air with remarkable finesse. He carefully moves the side-stick forward once more, and the altimeter responds rapidly, its needle sliding swiftly to the right, signaling the plane's continued elevation into the skies. They finally break through the dense cloud cover, emerging into a clearing where bright sunlight floods the cockpit, illuminating the space with a warm glow. Whip expertly levels out the aircraft, maintaining a steady course through the newly found serenity.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: As a plane steadily accelerates along the runway at Orlando International Airport, its wheels lifting from the concrete, it ascends into the sky, cutting through the thick and heavy clouds that blanket the city. Meanwhile, in a dimly lit room, a digital clock perched on a bedside table ticks from 7:13 to 7:14 with a soft, mechanical click. At that moment, a dark-haired woman, her hair cascading down around her shoulders and her skin exposed to the cool air, sits up in bed and swings her legs over the side to stand. As she rises from the bed, a man, lying on his stomach, begins to stir from his sleep. The woman, now on her feet, confidently strides over to collect her purse, causing the man to fully awaken, pushing himself up from the mattress just in time to see her exit the room. Picking up his cell phone from a nearby surface, he props himself up and takes a swig from a beer bottle that is nearly drained of its contents, his eyes fixed on the door as the woman reenters. She moves with purpose, selecting some clothes from a nearby pile, slipping on a thong with practiced ease. In a leisurely manner, the man lights a cigarette, the flame briefly illuminating his face as the woman simultaneously ignites a joint. The man reclines onto his back, exhaling smoke, while the woman clambers onto the bed, straddling him to offer him a hit from the joint. She then gracefully dismounts, leaving him to enjoy his cigarette as he sits upright once more and leans forward to inhale a line of cocaine, the action sharp and quick. He stands and exits the room, now clad in a crisp black suit, dark sunglasses adding to his air of authority, an airplane pin gleaming on his lapel beneath his pilot's cap. Outside, at the airport, raindrops pelt the ground, and lightning cracks through the sky as hurried travelers dash across the tarmac. Covered by a raincoat, the man walks deliberately beneath the belly of a stationary South Jet airplane, halting momentarily beside one of its massive wheels to spray mouth freshener into his open mouth. He resumes his pace, jogging towards the mobile stairway, his foot slipping briefly on the first step before he regains his balance and enters the aircraft through a side door. Inside the cockpit, he settles into his seat, nodding at his co-pilot, Whitaker, who is busy inhaling oxygen and adjusting restlessly in his seat. Ken observes Whip as he smooths his hair back, preparing for their flight. Parallel to this, in another locale, a woman emerges from her room at Hotel Atlanta, a folded massage table tucked under one arm, her dress swaying slightly with each step, her shoulder adorned with a small tattoo. She extracts some bills from a thick roll of cash, proceeds to her car, and places the massage table in the trunk. Seated in the driver's seat, she lights a cigarette, her fingers deftly dialing a call, her elbow resting on the steering wheel as she lowers the phone onto the passenger seat. Elsewhere, a man scrutinizes Nicole as he snorts cocaine, while Brad nonchalantly lets his towel fall and grips a small, square object. Sitting in a different room, Margaret faces Trina silently. Back on the plane, Whip expertly nudges the side-stick forward, causing the cockpit to tremble slightly before taking hold of the yoke, pulling back with precision as the aircraft ascends. The plane vibrates with turbulence, overhead bins releasing their contents into the aisles. Ken steals a nervous glance at Whip, who remains composed, eyes fixed on the horizon, as he maneuvers the aircraft through the turbulent air. With skill, he moves the side-stick forward again, watching the altimeter needle glide swiftly to the right, marking their ascent. The plane breaks through the sea of clouds into a clearing, where they are greeted by bright sunlight, and Whip gently levels the aircraft, stabilizing it amidst the enveloping calm.

test_cases.name: Micro-Actions -> Macro-Actions
test_cases.description: A plane takes off from Orlando International Airport amid heavy clouds. In a room, a digital clock changes from 7:13 to 7:14 as a dark-haired woman sits up and exits the bed. A man, woken by her departure, picks up a phone, drinks from a beer bottle, and watches her return. She picks out clothes, puts on a thong, and both share a moment lighting a cigarette and a joint. The woman climbs onto the bed to offer the man the joint before getting off again. He smokes, sits up, snorts cocaine, and later leaves the room wearing a black suit with a pilot's cap, ready for work. As rain lashes the airport with lightning in the distance, people dash across the tarmac. The man, now in a raincoat, pauses beneath a South Jet airplane, freshens his breath, and heads to the mobile stairway, slipping on the first step. He enters through a side door, joining his co-pilot, Whitaker, in the cockpit, and settles in as Whip fidgets and inhales oxygen. Meanwhile, a woman emerges from her Hotel Atlanta room with a folded massage table and some cash, placing the table in her car trunk. She smokes, makes a call, and rests her phone on the passenger seat. A man observes Nicole as Brad drops his towel. Elsewhere, Margaret sits with Trina. Back in the plane, Whip skillfully handles the side-stick and yoke through turbulent skies, with Ken observing uneasily. Despite the shaking, Whip navigates the aircraft, leveling it out as they ascend into clearer skies and sunlight.

test_cases.name: Insert Attributes, Emotions and Scene
test_cases.description: A plane takes off from Orlando International Airport, one of the busiest airports in the United States, amid heavy clouds. In a dimly lit room, a digital clock on a bedside table reads 7:13 and then turns to 7:14. A naked dark-haired woman, with her hair falling around her shoulders, sits up on a bed and then gets off the bed. A naked man sleeping on his stomach, who appears to have spent the night drinking, wakes up as the woman takes a purse and walks out of the room; the man picks up a cell phone, sits up in bed, drinks from an almost empty beer bottle, a remnant of their late-night indulgence, and watches the shapely woman reenter the room. The woman picks out some clothes, slips on a thong designed by a popular lingerie brand, and the man lights a cigarette while the woman lights a joint, a common recreational act in some social circles. The man lies on his back, the woman climbs on the bed and straddles the man, puts the joint to his lips, then gets off the bed. The man smokes a cigarette, sits up, and snorts a line of cocaine, a dangerous drug that temporarily enhances alertness. He walks out of the room dressed in a black suit, sporting dark glasses under a pilot's cap, with an airplane pin on his lapel that signifies his rank and affiliation. As rain lashes the airport and lightning flashes in the distance, people run across the tarmac to find shelter. The man, now in a raincoat to protect against the downpour, walks under a parked South Jet airplane, the model of which is known for its reliability, pauses near one of the wheels, opens his mouth, sprays some mouth freshener to mask any odors, trots to the mobile stairway leading to the passenger walkway, and slips on the first step. He joins the passengers through a side door and sits next to his co-pilot, Whitaker, who is known for his efficiency. Whip inhales oxygen, a routine for pilots to ensure alertness, and fidgets on his side of the cockpit as Ken watches him brush his hair. Meanwhile, a woman steps out of her room at Hotel Atlanta, a popular chain for quick stays, carrying a folded-up massage table, wearing a dress, and showing a small tattoo on her shoulder, likely of personal significance. She pulls some bills from a bundle of cash, walks to a car, and places the massage table in the trunk. She smokes as she makes a call from the driver's seat, leans on the steering wheel, and lowers the phone to the passenger seat as she finishes the conversation. A man snorts coke and looks Nicole over, considering her presence in his space, while Brad drops his towel and holds a small square that hints at another illicit substance. Elsewhere, Margaret sits facing Trina in a setting suggesting an intense conversation. Back in the plane, Whip pushes the side-stick forward, an action to gain altitude, the cockpit shakes, and Whip takes the yoke and pulls back as they ascend. The plane shakes, and items fall from the overhead bins, a common occurrence during turbulence. Ken casts an uneasy sideways glance at Whip, who, with eyes on the horizon, steers the plane through the rough air, demonstrating his skill and experience. He moves the side-stick forward, the altimeter slides quickly to the right, indicating a rapid climb, as the plane rises, and they reach a clearing through clouds and bright sunlight as Whip levels out, bringing calm to the once tumultuous journey.

Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. He joins the passengers through a side door and sits next to his copilot. Whitaker. Whip inhales oxygen and fidgets on his side of the cockpit as Ken watches him brush his hair. Meanwhile a woman steps out of her room at Hotel Atlanta carrying a foldedup massage table wearing a dress and showing a small tattoo on her shoulder. She pulls some bills from a bundle of cash walks to a car and places the massage table in the trunk. She smokes as she makes a call from the driver's seat leans on the steering wheel and lowers the phone to the passenger seat. A man snorts coke and looks Nicole over while Brad drops his towel and holds a small square. Elsewhere Margaret sits facing Trina. Back in the plane Whip pushes the sidestick forward. the cockpit shakes and Whip takes the yoke and pulls back as they ascend. The plane shakes and items fall from the overhead bins. Ken casts an uneasy sideways glance at Whip who with eyes on the horizon steers the plane through the rough air. He moves the sidestick forward. the altimeter slides quickly to the right as the plane rises and they reach a clearing through clouds and bright sunlight as Whip levels out.

Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Amid the vibrant chaos of a South American carnival a fearless dancer twirls through streets bursting with color and rhythm each graceful move challenging the rigid boundaries of tradition. During a clandestine meeting in a snowcovered mountain lodge two rival spies exchange cryptic messages hinting at an imminent global conspiracy. their whispered words carried off by the howling wind. Inside a lavish 1920s speakeasy a troubled jazz musician pours his soul into a melancholic melody every note echoing the bittersweet memories of lost love and shattered dreams. In a futuristic space station orbiting a distant planet an intrepid crew confronts bizarre alien phenomena and an enigmatic interstellar threat pushing the limits of human endurance. Amidst the chaos of a raging civil war a compassionate medic races through bombedout streets. his every desperate step a race against time to save lives in the midst of utter devastation. He joins the passengers through a side door and sits next to his copilot. Whitaker. Whip inhales oxygen and fidgets on his side of the cockpit as Ken watches him brush his hair. Meanwhile a woman steps out of her room at Hotel Atlanta carrying a foldedup massage table wearing a dress and showing a small tattoo on her shoulder. She pulls some bills from a bundle of cash walks to a car and places the massage table in the trunk. She smokes as she makes a call from the driver's seat leans on the steering wheel and lowers the phone to the passenger seat. A man snorts coke and looks Nicole over while Brad drops his towel and holds a small square. Elsewhere Margaret sits facing Trina. Back in the plane Whip pushes the sidestick forward. the cockpit shakes and Whip takes the yoke and pulls back as they ascend. The plane shakes and items fall from the overhead bins. Ken casts an uneasy sideways glance at Whip who with eyes on the horizon steers the plane through the rough air. He moves the sidestick forward. the altimeter slides quickly to the right as the plane rises and they reach a clearing through clouds and bright sunlight as Whip levels out.

test_cases.name: Deletion (~50%)
test_cases.description: A plane takes off from Orlando International Airport amid heavy clouds. In a room a digital clock on a bedside table reads 713 and then turns to 714. A naked darkhaired woman with her hair falling around her shoulders sits up on a bed and then gets off the bed. A naked man sleeping on his stomach wakes up as the woman takes a purse and walks out of the room. the man picks up a cell phone sits up in bed drinks from an almost empty beer bottle and watches the shapely woman reenter the room. The woman picks out some clothes slips on a thong and the man lights a cigarette while the woman lights a joint. The man lies on his back. Elsewhere Margaret sits facing Trina. Back in the plane Whip pushes the sidestick forward. the cockpit shakes and Whip takes the yoke and pulls back as they ascend. The plane shakes and items fall from the overhead bins. Ken casts an uneasy sideways glance at Whip who with eyes on the horizon steers the plane through the rough air. He moves the sidestick forward. the altimeter slides quickly to the right as the plane rises and they reach a clearing through clouds and bright sunlight as Whip levels out.

test_cases.name: Deletion (~80%)
test_cases.description: A plane takes off from Orlando International Airport amid heavy clouds. In a room a digital clock on a bedside table reads 713 and then turns to 714. A naked darkhaired woman with her hair falling around her shoulders sits up on a bed and then gets off the bed. Ken casts an uneasy sideways glance at Whip who with eyes on the horizon steers the plane through the rough air. He moves the sidestick forward. the altimeter slides quickly to the right as the plane rises and they reach a clearing through clouds and bright sunlight as Whip levels out.

test_cases.name: Subject-Action-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: A spaceship whooshes away from Sydney Spaceport amid floating meteorites. In a cavern, a mechanical sundial on a granite pedestal displays 3:27 and then shifts to 3:28. A clothed blond boy, with a cloak draping around his waist, leaps up on a hammock and then hops off the hammock. A clothed girl sprawled on her side rouses as the boy grabs a backpack and leaps out of the cavern; the girl seizes a handheld radio, rises in the hammock, gulps from a nearly full lemonade pitcher, and observes the lanky boy dart back into the cavern. The boy chooses some boots, throws on a scarf, and the girl brews a pot of tea while the boy ignites a lantern. The girl reclines on her side, the boy perches on the hammock and hovers above the girl, places the lantern near her face, then hops off the hammock. The girl steeps a teabag, rises up, and chews a piece of candy. She skips out into the cavern wrapped in a white cloak, wearing yellow boots under a chef's hat, with a wooden spoon on her apron. As snow flurries the spaceport and comets blaze in the distance, animals scamper across the plateau. The girl, now in a parka, sidles under a resting Lunar Shuttle, halts beside one of the fins, opens her hand, sprinkles some sugar, strolls to the satellite ladder leading to the crew hatch, and stumbles on the final rung. She mingles with the crew through a hatchway and lands next to her navigator, Fletcher. Flit exhales helium and taps on his console of the control room as Zoe glimpses him tie a ribbon. Meanwhile, a knight steps out of her castle at Fortress Vienna, lugging a rolled-up parchment, wearing armor, and showing a small crest on her helm. She extracts some coins from a heap of treasure, strides to a steed, and places the parchment on the saddle. She whistles as she transmits a signal from the rider's bench, sprawls on the leather straps, and drops the radio to the footrest. A bard inhales steam and examines Lyria, while Harold drops his scarf and clutches a round disc. Elsewhere, Winston stands peering at Fiona. Back in the spaceship, Flit pushes the control lever downward, the control room vibrates, and Flit seizes the joystick and steers forward as they ascend. The spaceship trembles, and gadgets tumble from the ceiling compartments. Zoe casts an anxious backward glance at Flit, who, with focus on the galaxies, navigates the spaceship through the tumultuous void. She maneuvers the control lever downward, the gauge slides swiftly to the center as the spaceship soars, and they clear a nebula through cosmic dust and radiant starlight as Flit stabilizes the journey.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: A plane departs Orlando amid heavy clouds. At 7:14, a dark-haired woman leaves a man in bed to get dressed; he watches her, smokes, and uses cocaine before putting on a pilot's uniform and heading to the airport. As rain and lightning hit, he hurries to the plane and joins his co-pilot, Whitaker. Whip takes oxygen and appears restless as the cockpit shakes during takeoff. Meanwhile, a woman at Hotel Atlanta exits her room with a massage table, stows it in her car, and makes a call. As Whip pilots the plane through turbulence, items fall, and his co-pilot, Ken, watches uneasily. Whip skillfully navigates to a clearing, leveling the plane in bright sunlight.
